Body:
n_s = 50
n_l = 100
file_name_s = get_basis_file_name(n_s, sigma)
file_name_l = get_basis_file_name(n_l, sigma)
def remove_files():
    if os.path.exists(file_name_s):
        os.remove(file_name_s)
    if os.path.exists(file_name_l):
        os.remove(file_name_l)
remove_files()
cache_cleanup()
Ai_s = get_bs_cached(n_s, sigma, correction=False, basis_dir=DATA_DIR,
    verbose=False)
cache_cleanup()
Ai_s_l = get_bs_cached(n_l, sigma, correction=False, basis_dir=DATA_DIR,
    verbose=False)
cache_cleanup()
remove_files()
Ai_l = get_bs_cached(n_l, sigma, correction=False, basis_dir=DATA_DIR,
    verbose=False)
cache_cleanup()
Ai_l_s = get_bs_cached(n_s, sigma, correction=False, basis_dir=DATA_DIR,
    verbose=False)
cache_cleanup()
remove_files()
assert_allclose(Ai_s, Ai_l_s, atol=1e-15, rtol=1e-15)
assert_allclose(Ai_l, Ai_s_l, atol=1e-15, rtol=1e-15)
